727599f-a.text:
(1)
Northern Boulevard, north side,west of 6lst Street, showing in the background a peaked roof building which was formerly the Charlotteville Hotel which was operated by A. Dandler in 1873. This hotel was srected in 1868 and ooerated by A. Dandler and August H. Eberhart (the son-in-law) until 1873. Eberhart conducted it alone as a hotel froo 1873 to 1896.
It was still standing in 1929.
March 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(a)
The same, showing the hotel at the N.W. corner of 60th Street.
October 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
